Generation IV.Diamond: It freezes foes with an icy breath nearly -60 degrees F . What seems to be its body is actually hollow.
Generation IV.Pearl: It freezes foes with an icy breath nearly -60 degrees F . What seems to be its body is actually hollow.
Generation IV.Platinum: It freezes prey by blowing its -58 degree F breath. It is said to then secretly display its prey.
Generation IV.HeartGold: Legends in snowy regions say that a woman who was lost on an icy mountain was reborn as Froslass .
Generation IV.SoulSilver: Legends in snowy regions say that a woman who was lost on an icy mountain was reborn as Froslass [ sic ]

Generation V.Black: It freezes prey by blowing its -58 degree F breath. It is said to then secretly display its prey.
Generation V.White: It freezes prey by blowing its -58 degree F breath. It is said to then secretly display its prey.
Generation V.Black 2: It freezes prey by blowing its -58 degree F breath. It is said to then secretly display its prey.
Generation V.White 2: It freezes prey by blowing its -58 degree F breath. It is said to then secretly display its prey.

Generation VI.X: It freezes foes with an icy breath nearly -60 degrees Fahrenheit . What seems to be its body is actually hollow.
Generation VI.Y: Legends in snowy regions say that a woman who was lost on an icy mountain was reborn as Froslass.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: It freezes foes with an icy breath nearly -60 degrees Fahrenheit . What seems to be its body is actually hollow.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Legends in snowy regions say that a woman who was lost on an icy mountain was reborn as Froslass.

Generation VII.Sun: When it finds humans or Pokémon it likes, it freezes them and takes them to its chilly den, where they become decorations.
Generation VII.Moon: The soul of a woman lost on a snowy mountain possessed an icicle, becoming this Pokémon. The food it most relishes is the souls of men.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: It freezes hikers who have come to climb snowy mountains and carries them back to its home. It only goes after men it thinks are handsome.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: It's said that on nights of terrible blizzards, it comes down to human settlements. If you hear it knocking at your door, do not open it!

Generation VIII.Sword: After a woman met her end on a snowy mountain, her regrets lingered on. From them, this Pokémon was born. Its favorite food is frozen souls.
Generation VIII.Shield: It spits out cold air of nearly −60 degrees Fahrenheit to freeze its quarry. It brings frozen prey back to its lair and neatly lines them up.
Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: It freezes foes with an icy breath that is nearly −60 degrees Fahrenheit . What seems to be its body is actually hollow.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: It freezes foes with an icy breath that is nearly −60 degrees Fahrenheit . What seems to be its body is actually hollow.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: A Pokémon inhabited by the soul of a woman who died bearing a grudge in the snowy mountains. Legends of Froslass placing deathly curses on misbehaving men send shivers down my spine.

Generation IX.Scarlet: When it finds humans or Pokémon it likes, it freezes them and takes them to its chilly den, where they become decorations.
Generation IX.Violet: It freezes prey by blowing its −58 degree Fahrenheit breath. It is said to then secretly display its prey.
